sentences.cn: ...一个自命为政治新手的叫罗斯·佩罗的人。

sentences.en: Frontlines aims to discourage such reckless neophyte abandon in a variety of ways.
sentences.cn: 决战火线:燃料战争打算用各种各样的方阻止鲁莽的初学者.

sentences.en: Gaffer was no neophyte and had no fancies.
sentences.cn: 老头儿不是新手,他不会胡思乱想.

sentences.en: He is a neophyte at politics.
The neophyte began to stammer out a reply , but fell silent.
sentences.cn: 新门徒嗫嚅了两句, 然后沉默了.

sentences.en: The neophyte must not despair of mastering the rules and procedures.
sentences.cn: 初学的人不必在熟悉规则和程序中感到失望.

words.tran_cn: 新信徒；新入教者；初学者

trans.tran_cn: 初学者，新手，新近改变信仰或皈依某宗教的人，新来杂草植物，新引种植物
trans.tran_en: a new member of a religious group
